metadata.title: CVE-2024-22725 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Orthanc versions before 1.12.2 are affected by a reflected cross-sitescripting (XSS) vulnerability. The vulnerability was present in theserver's error reporting.

criterions.comment: orthanc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
